title: 48  Gerrit Rietveld, Red-Blue Chair, designed 1918, manufactured 1920/21
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">48  
Designed by Gerrit Rietveld (Dutch, 1888–1964)  
Red-Blue Chair  
Designed 1918, manufactured 1920/21  
Painted plywood; 87 × 66 × 81.3 cm (33 3/4 × 26 × 32 in.)  
Through prior gifts of Mrs. Albert J. Beveridge, Florene May Schoenborn, and Samuel A. Marx; through prior acquisition of the Richard T. Crane Jr. Memorial and the Mary Waller Langhorne funds; Richard T. Crane Jr. Endowment, 1988.274

</section><section id="figures">Gerrit Rietveld, Red-Blue Chair, designed 1918, manufactured 1920/21.

</section>
